Name: Bondage Girl
About the game: This is a tight room escape game with binding elements. The player controls the bound heroine to search for the props, unlock the shackles, avoid the enemy and escape the chamber of secrets, and finally wins! Game features: 路Story mode - control the heroine's customs clearance and plot. 路Logo mode - you can change the clothes, posture and shackles of the heroine in the logo scene. 路Collection - clothing, shackles need to be collected through the level of the game. 路Binding elements and various clothes
